articles.author: Taylor Herzlich
articles.title: Astronomer slams ‘fake’ Andy Byron apology after CEO caught in Coldplay ‘kiss cam’ scandal - New York Post
articles.description: The CEO and head of HR’s alleged affair was exposed when they were caught cozying up at a Coldplay concert on the “kiss cam.”
articles.content:
The tech firm home to CEO Andy Byron and his alleged HR mistress who were caught cozying up on a kiss cam at a Coldplay concert has quickly refuted a fake apology going viral online.
New York-based … [+2456 chars]

articles.author: Yurii Stasiuk
articles.title: CBS cancels Stephen Colbert’s show days after Trump settlement criticism - Politico
articles.description: The late-night host had scoffed at a decision by CBS’s parent company to pay the U.S. president $16 million over a disputed interview.
articles.content: Press freedom groups and advocates said Trumps lawsuit, which accused CBS of editing the interview to portray Harris more favorably, was frivolous and the settlement, according to them, will further … [+645 chars]
